Belgium:
Siege of Saint-Omer: French army fails to take the city of Saint-Omer
Battle of Kallo: Cardinal-Infante Ferdinand of Austria prevents Dutch forces from encircling Antwerp.
China: The Peking Gazette first used moveable type.
Japan: Shimabara Rebellion: The last of the rebels were defeated in their fortress at Shimabara.
Sweden: Colony of New Sweden established along the Delaware River in North America
